HOW TO PLAY

STEP 1

BUY TICKET

Select the number on the board. Select the amount for each ticket.

STEP 2

WAIT FOR THE DRAW

The draw continously for every 10 minutes.

STEP 3

CHECK FOR THE PRIZE

Once the round's over, come back to the page and check to see if you've won!
